trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Virginia Beach
There were 3 other sightings in Virginia Beach on or around March 30th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi work in a retail market and 9 out of 10 people saw and\or felt it, including myself i did not see it i felt it. my son works on camp pendleton and he and his commanding officer were outside when, he saw the thing fly thru the sky and the sky lite-up like daylight - then the earth shook. he and his commanding officer thought it was artillery fire. his co called in to see if it was artillery fire and he was told, no they were not doing that tonight. they said, they had no idea what it was, they all saw it and were waiting on word from above but as of now, they did not know... i think it is funny that it got quiet so quick. it barely made the news! it only got a small mention on the national news. i have family in nj, me, nc and sc and they did not even know what i was talking about when i asked them if they had heard about it... weird...
Summary: Fireball and flash and sonic boom and earth shook.
